Metadata.Title: CVE-2010-0298 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.35.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2010-0298 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.35.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.35.1-1, affected by CVE-2010-0298
